flavor_text_entries.ruby:
This POKéMON has a body of steel.
To make its body, ARON feeds on
iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by
eating bridges and rails.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
ARON has a body of steel.
With one all-out charge, this POKéMON
can demolish even a heavy dump truck. The destroyed dump truck then becomes
a handy meal for the POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A POKéMON that is clad in steel armor.
A new suit of armor is made when it evolves.
The old, discarded armor is salvaged as
metal for making iron products.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It eats iron to build its steel body.
It is a pest that descends from mountains
to eat bridges and train tracks.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
It eats iron to build its steel body.
It is a pest that descends from mountains
to eat bridges and train tracks.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It usually lives deep in mountains.
However, hunger may drive it to
eat railroad tracks and cars.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It usually lives deep in mountains.
However, hunger may drive it to
eat railroad tracks and cars.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It usually lives deep in mountains.
However, hunger may drive it to
eat railroad tracks and cars.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
When it evolves, it sheds the steel
carapace that covered its whole body
and develops a new one.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
When it evolves, it sheds the steel
carapace that covered its whole body
and develops a new one.
flavor_text_entries.black:
It usually lives deep in mountains.
However, hunger may drive it to
eat railroad tracks and cars.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It usually lives deep in mountains.
However, hunger may drive it to
eat railroad tracks and cars.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
In order to build up its steel body,
it eats iron ore. This pesky Pokémon
is known to eat railroad tracks.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
In order to build up its steel body,
it eats iron ore. This pesky Pokémon
is known to eat railroad tracks.
flavor_text_entries.x:
It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger
may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
flavor_text_entries.y:
When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that
covered its whole body and develops a new one.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
This Pokémon has a body of steel. To make its body, Aron
feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally,
it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this
Pokémon can demolish even a heavy dump truck.
The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal
for the Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It eats iron ore—and sometimes railroad tracks—
to build up the steel armor that protects its body.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In
ancient times, people would collect Aron’s shed
armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.
